page.title: 03Schools <secondary>
page.content:
Buckingham County Secondary School, This school was {opened on June 17th 1935. New buildings were added in 1977. It's on London Road,South Buckingham. There are 480 pupils and 30 teachers.The age range is{12 to 17}years.The facilities include cooking, courts, music, squash courts and 8 computers. The uniform is black and white with a school crest. The{school hours}are from 8.55 to 3.45
Royal Latin School, This school is found in extensive grounds on the outskirts of Buckingham. The school was{built in {1962}and it was founded in 1423.It has 40 teachers and 670 pupils, 49 are boarders. The children are selected by the "12+". The uniform red, black and grey.The day is from 8.50 to 3.50. The age range is{12-18 years.
